tool_description: Converts text addresses to precise latitude/longitude coordinates using multiple geocoding services for accuracy.

addresses.description: Array of street addresses to geocode

country_code.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to improve geocoding accuracy

precision_level.description: Required precision: street, building, or approximate

include_metadata.description: Include additional location metadata in results

error_messages: Address not found: One or more addresses could not be geocoded. Check address formatting and completeness.
Invalid country code: Use valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes (e.g., US, CA, GB).
Invalid precision level: Use street, building, or approximate.
Geocoding service unavailable: External geocoding services are temporarily unavailable.
Address limit exceeded: Maximum 25 addresses allowed per request.
usage: Provide array of text addresses with optional country code and precision requirements. Returns coordinates for each successfully geocoded address.

geocoded_results.description: Array of geocoding results in format 'address:latitude,longitude'

failed_addresses.description: Array of addresses that could not be geocoded

geocoding_summary.description: Summary of geocoding process and success rate
